class_description: Interrelated physical phenomena and processes describing quantum radiation from black holes and its consequence of black hole mass loss and evaporation.

member_entities.entity_name: quantum effects near the event horizon

member_entities.entity_description: The process by which a black hole gradually disappears over time due to mass loss from radiation.
member_entities.resolution_context: This radiation causes black holes to slowly lose mass and eventually evaporate over time, leading to the so-called black hole information paradox.
